content.rendered:
Written by Greg Pak.

Language English.

Producers Aaron Lam. Jack Liang. Series Production Management. Joey Tennutti. Series Sound Department. Luang Gao. Junsheng Han. Sukumar Nallagonda. Jason Oliver. Vijay Rathinam. Liu Wanxin. Lian Xidong.

Production Boom! Studios. Hulu Originals. Polygon Pictures.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 1

Status OnGoing (2023–)
